description:
Nicholas is a cute gay guy who is long, lean, and has wholesome freckles that mask a boy who's got a naughty streak a mile wide.
Though the boy is packing a big thick stick, he prefers to bottom.
I'm gonna see about putting him with one of the straight guys and see what comes up!
And uh...for some reason, Nicholas wanted a little help getting over the top. The video gets a little POV, so if you like seeing a hint of the pervy videographer getting some attention, you will like this one!
title: Nicholas - Solo
